title: If you know how I feel: Scott's old new friend
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Values
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Stereotype (Psychology)

description: Tells the story of 10-year-old Scott who befriends an old woman in a park. The value of their friendship is revealed as Scott obtains books for the woman and she helps him to improve his reading. A sympathetic portrayal of old age that will help in breaking down stereotypes and promoting discussion about values and self-determination. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
